channel.title: Thieving
channel.description: I was wondering how I could make thieving stalls give out one of about 8 items randomly. Like you put in 8 item id's for it to give you, but it doesn't give you all of them at once, it will randomly give you them. Example: I click on the thieving stall, I get an emerald, I click on it again, I get a sapphire, I click it again, a diamond, and so on and so forth. Wondering if it's possible to do that. Thanks.

item.title: Thieving
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

I was wondering how I could make thieving stalls give out one of about 8 items randomly. Like you put in 8 item id’s for it to give you, but it doesn’t give you all of them at once, it will randomly give you them. Example: I click on the thieving stall, I get an emerald, I click on it again, I get a sapphire, I click it again, a diamond, and so on and so forth. Wondering if it’s possible to do that. Thanks.
